recipesJson.name: Mankind's Purple Pie
recipesJson.author: SlashaLO
recipesJson.description: Mick Foley, one of my favorite wrestlers from the past. His favorite color just so happens to be purple, more or less. So we are going to grab a mix that is a "purple" dessert. We are going to go with some coconut and berries. We will add some honey and vanilla swirl to round everything out, and add some depth to the mix. Sweeten to taste!
